description: One Bowl Vegan Banana Apple Bread. This moist Vegan Banana Bread has ripe banana, shredded apple and nut butter. Add Walnuts or chocolate chips. Vegan Breakfast Recipe. Makes One 8.5 by 4.5 loaf pan.
name: One Bowl Vegan Banana Apple Bread
recipeIngredient: 1 3/4 cup flour (I use 1 cup spelt/white whole wheat + 3/4 cup unbleached white flour)
1 tsp pumpkin pie spice (or cinnamon or other spices of choice)
3 to 4 Tbsp powdered / fine sugar or sweetener
2 Tbsp nut butter or use oil (I use almond butter)
1 cup grated apple (1 regular size apple shredded)
A few Tbsps walnuts, pecans, vegan chocolate, dried fruit, chopped dates or other additions

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 365 degrees F / 180oc
In a bowl whisk all the dry ingredients really well. (flour through sugar, including sugar).

In a small blender, add banana, non dairy milk, nut butter, molasses, vanilla. Blend until smooth. (You can also mash the banana in a bowl until smooth then mix in the non dairy milk, nut butter and molasses). Add to the bowl. Mix until well combined into a stiff batter. Add grated apple. Add walnuts, other nuts, dates, or chocolate chips. I added 2 tbsp chopped walnuts, 1 Tbsp chopped cashews and 2 Tbsp chocolate chips. fold in well.
Transfer batter to parchment lines loaf pan. Sprinkle chopped nuts on top (optional).
Bake for 40 minutes at 365 degrees F / 180oc.
Reduce heat to 350 degrees F / 170oc. Bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until toothpick from the center comes out almost clean.
Cool for 10 minutes in the pan. Remove from the pan and cool completely before slicing.

video.description:
1 Bowl Banana Apple Bread! 
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2015/10/one-bowl-vegan-banana-apple-bread.html
ðŸ’™ðŸ§¡BUY MY COOKBOOK: https://veganricha.com/vrekaz

Easy Vegan Banana Apple Bread with bananas, apple, nut butter, no added oil option, nuts and chocolate chips. This banana bread has shredded apple for extra moisture and texture. Use zucchini to make Banana Zucchini bread.  

This bread needs 1 bowl. Whisk in the dry ingredients. Blend up the banana with non dairy milk. No banana chunks, no mashing needed. Add in the shredded apple and nuts. Bake, slice and serve. You can also make the batter into Vegan Banana Apple muffins. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes. 

For Gluten-free Banana Bread see https://www.veganricha.com/?s=gluten+free+banana+bread
